action.action-desc: Mr. Cawthorn introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and Labor

form.official-title: To amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to provide for the expiration of emergency temporary standards after 6 months.

section.text: Section 6(c)(2) of the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 (29 U.S.C. 655(c)(2)) is amended by inserting before the period at the end the following: , but in no case shall such emergency temporary standard remain in effect for a period exceeding 6 months.
